summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5702 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Green Lake Circle Railroad Addition, being the alley between Greenwood Avenue and Palatine Avenue from North 65th Street to North 67th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75394, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
